title: The Traveller
creator_credit: John Hansen, ACMI Digital Storytelling and ACMI
brief_description: John Hansen’s war experience really started after World War II. Having been seconded into the US Navy, John was there to celebrate in the streets of California when the war ended. Then he travelled the world, transporting a variety of things, from war brides to coal. In the end, the world became his classroom.
